name: Sqaurer Fighter
description:
A game is not a word it's a feeling of excitement WITH THIS small word big line thing I am introducing to my second game .

The was basically made for a game jam and the jam  ends  in 5 minutes so I have to hurry.

void About The Game:{

The game game is about a blue player who has a gun and has a power to shoot infinite bullet . 

WASD or arrow keys helps the player to move and space is for his gun shooting bullets

their are red cubes are there to kill you  and of course you have mission to kill them.

Yeah totally original idea *wink* 

Will red boyz takeover you or you will end their infinite army.

Note: If you want you can download but if you try to upload and held the game itch.io will ban you and your(my) game.

}
